entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: WSW 52 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
